::DarkMouse::

She looked at Wildfire as she looked at the flier in an odd way. 
"That's just Terrorsaur. he's a little grumpy, but nice just the same.
But why so causious about things? I don't understand. Please, explain 
this all to me. I wasn't there in the cave. I didn't see what they 
saw, I am at a loss for understanding."  She really wasn't sure what 
Wildfire was talking about.  She could see images that the mind 
reading bot could project to her, but she had no clue as to how this 
bot could see what other bots thought.
